channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: New Kid and Family Movies in 2025: Calendar of Release Dates (Updating)
item.description: Lights, camera, action! 🎥🍿 Get ready to groove with the soundtracks of the latest kid and family movies hitting screens in 2025! 🎶 #MovieMagic

item.title: Jarvis Cocker, Luvcat and more lead Montreux Jazz Festival weekend dedicated to British culture
item.description: 🇬🇧 Let's have a jolly good time at Montreux Jazz Festival! 🎶 British vibes with Jarvis Cocker and Luvcat! 🙌 #MontreuxJazzFestival #BritishMusic

item.title: “Weird Al” Yankovic Launches “The Bigger & Weirder 2025 Tour” with Hits-Filled Set
item.description: 🤪 Get ready to party with polka! 🎶 “Weird Al” Yankovic is hitting the road on "The Bigger & Weirder 2025 Tour"! 🚌 #WeirdAl2025

item.title: Gary Numan announces ‘Telekon’ 45th anniversary UK tour
item.description: 🚀 Calling all synth-pop lovers! Gary Numan is hitting the road for ‘Telekon’ 45th anniversary tour in the UK! 🎶 #GaryNuman #TelekonTour

item.title: Roger Daltrey Receives Knighthood for Contributions to Music and Charity: ‘It’s a Wonderful Honor’
item.description: 👑 Sir Roger Daltrey has a nice ring to it! Congrats to the legendary rock star on his well-deserved knighthood! 🎸 #RockRoyalty
